Home Page

Saphira

This is an example project I have built to demonstrate my skills on Laravel and Angular JS. I have tried to follow all the good programming practices I know of in this project and I am always refactoring it to make the code organization better. My ultimate goal is to make it fully unit tested both on backend Codeception testing and frontend angular testing.

Contents

List of OS projects/concepts being used in this this projects:

  • Laravel 4
  • Cartalyst Sentry 2
  • Angular JS
  • Satellizer
